description:
Many people go through life everyday not realizing their worth. They often think external factors such as their careers, family or society are what makes them valuable and not what they have to contribute. They are suffering from lack of identity and low self-esteem because they have placed less regard to what they want to accomplish in life and more on what someone else wants. It is now time to realize everyone was put on this earth to do something great no matter how big or small.

You will realize the person you were meant to be regardless of what attitudes may have been place on you by others.

This will course consist of the presentation handout where you can jot down notes. You will also get an audio version of the steps to download and listen to over and over if needed.

In this course you will learn 10 simple steps that will dispel those beliefs you have about yourself. You will first need to fill out the self-analysis to help you discover you talent and skills that is step one. This will consist of three simple questions and I will walk you through on how to fill it out. Next we will go into detail on the other nine steps that consist of:

Â·Change your attitude about yourself

  • Do a self-analysis
  • Stop putting conditions on yourself
  • Make yourself count
  • Value yourself above materialism
  • Value your time
  • Follow through
  • Live for the present
  • Deal with your challenges
  • Stop being a people pleaser
title: How To Transform Your Self-worth In 10 Simple Steps
